lyrics: They put a parking lot on a piece of land Where the supermarket used to stand Before that they put up a bowling alley On the site that used to be the local Palais That's where the big bands used to come and play My sister went there on a Saturday  Come dancing All her boyfriends used to come and call Why not come dancing? title: Come Dancing
